LanguageData.Research_Airships.label: airship
LanguageData.Research_Airships.description: Basic research for airships designed for transportation. Unlocks the standard airship.
LanguageData.Research_Carryall_GDI.label: ox carryall
LanguageData.Research_Carryall_GDI.description: Unlocks the Ox carryall for mass transport.
LanguageData.Research_Carryall_Nod.label: vertigo carryall
LanguageData.Research_Carryall_Nod.description: Unlocks the Vertigo carryall for assault mission.
LanguageData.Research_Carryalls.label: carryall
LanguageData.Research_Carryalls.description: Basic research on VTOL aircrafts designed for intercontinental transportation. Unlocks the standard carryall.
LanguageData.Research_Kirov.label: airship
LanguageData.Research_Kirov.description: Unlocks the kirov airship for mass transportation and suicide mission.
